SEARCH
Module help
Package help

Class Step1Controller

java.lang.Object
help.Step1Controller
public class Step1Controller extends Object
Controller class responsible for handling the actions of Step 1 in the cashier multi-step process.

  • Constructor Details

    • Step1Controller

      public Step1Controller()

  • Method Details

    • handleCloseButtonAction

      private void handleCloseButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the action when the Close button is clicked. This method closes the current stage (window).
      Parameters:
      event - The ActionEvent triggered by the button click.

    • handleMinimizeButtonAction

      private void handleMinimizeButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the action when the Minimize button is clicked. This method minimizes the current stage (window).
      Parameters:
      event - The ActionEvent triggered by the button click.

    • loadAllMovies

      private void loadAllMovies() throws Exception
      Loads all the movies from the database and populates the TreeTableView. Creates a root item for the tree, adds movie items, and sets up the column.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs while loading the movies.

    • initialize

      private void initialize() throws Exception
      Initializes the UI components and loads movie data. Sets default values for ComboBox, adds listeners, and makes the window full screen.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs while initializing the UI or loading movies.

    • updateSelectedMovie

      public void updateSelectedMovie(Movie movie)
      Updates the selected movie label with the title of the selected movie. If no movie is selected, the label will display "No movie selected".
      Parameters:
      movie - The selected movie to display its title.

    • handleSearchButtonAction

      private void handleSearchButtonAction() throws Exception
      Handles the search button click and performs the search based on the selected type and input. If the input is invalid (not letters), an error dialog is shown. The search results are displayed in the TreeTableView.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs while performing the search.

    • handleMovieSelection

      private void handleMovieSelection()
      Handles the movie selection event in the TreeTableView. When a movie is selected, it updates the UI with the movie details including title, genre, summary, duration, and poster image (if available).

    • handleConfirmSelection

      private void handleConfirmSelection() throws IOException
      Handles the confirm selection event when the user confirms their movie selection. It saves the selected movie to the shopping cart and shows a confirmation alert. If no movie is selected, an error dialog is shown.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs while displaying the alert or loading the next scene.

    • handleNextButtonAction

      private void handleNextButtonAction() throws IOException
      Handles the action when the user clicks the 'Next' button. It checks if a movie is selected and loads the next step (step2.fxml). If no movie is selected, an error dialog is shown.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs while loading the next scene.

    • handleSignOutButtonAction

      private void handleSignOutButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the action when the user clicks the 'Sign Out' button. It clears the shopping cart, loads the login screen, and displays it in the current window.
      Parameters:
      event - The ActionEvent triggered by the button click.

    • showErrorDialog

      private void showErrorDialog(String errorMessage)
      Handles the action when the user clicks the 'Sign Out' button. It clears the shopping cart, loads the login screen, and displays it in the current window.
      Parameters:
      event - The ActionEvent triggered by the button click.
